name: CodeSum
img_caption_3: We wrote a lot about bootcamps!
message: We have a new logo this year, got audio cast on SoundCloud, got on Fast Company magazine, talked about Hack Reactor, Coding Dojo, Twitter Bootstrap ... and beyond. Google thinks we are highly ranked on Web Development Bootcamp topic. Thanks to you. This year of intense coding was possible and fruitful. Cheers - Dilys
